mapper.select: select shopkeeper_warehouse_key, goods_code, position_code, shop_code, max_num, min_num, account_num, occupy_num, available_num, description from shopkeeper_warehouse where shopkeeper_warehouse_key = #{shopkeeperWarehouseKey}

select shopkeeper_warehouse_key, goods_code, position_code, shop_code, max_num, min_num, account_num, occupy_num, available_num, description from shopkeeper_warehouse
and goods_code like concat('%', #{goodsCode}, '%')
and shop_code like concat('%', #{shopCode}, '%')
limit #{startRows,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(1) from shopkeeper_warehouse
and goods_code like concat('%', #{goodsCode}, '%')
and shop_code like concat('%', #{shopCode}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into shopkeeper_warehouse(shopkeeper_warehouse_key,goods_code, position_code, shop_code, max_num, min_num, account_num, occupy_num, available_num, description) values (#{shopkeeperWarehouseKey},#{goodsCode}, #{positionCode}, #{shopCode}, #{maxNum}, #{minNum}, #{accountNum}, #{occupyNum}, #{availableNum}, #{description})

insert into shopkeeper_warehouse(shopkeeper_warehouse_key,goods_code, position_code, shop_code, max_num, min_num, account_num, occupy_num, available_num, description) values
(#{entity.shopkeeperWarehouseKey},#{entity.goodsCode}, #{entity.positionCode}, #{entity.shopCode}, #{entity.maxNum}, #{entity.minNum}, #{entity.accountNum}, #{entity.occupyNum}, #{entity.availableNum}, #{entity.description})

insert into shopkeeper_warehouse(shopkeeper_warehouse_key,goods_code, position_code, shop_code, max_num, min_num, account_num, occupy_num, available_num, description) values
(#{entity.shopkeeperWarehouseKey},#{entity.goodsCode}, #{entity.positionCode}, #{entity.shopCode}, #{entity.maxNum}, #{entity.minNum}, #{entity.accountNum}, #{entity.occupyNum}, #{entity.availableNum}, #{entity.description})
on duplicate key update shopkeeper_warehouse_key=values(shopkeeper_warehouse_key), goods_code = values(goods_code), position_code = values(position_code), shop_code = values(shop_code), max_num = values(max_num), min_num = values(min_num), account_num = values(account_num), occupy_num = values(occupy_num), available_num = values(available_num), description = values(description)
mapper.update:
update shopkeeper_warehouse
goods_code = #{goodsCode},
position_code = #{positionCode},
shop_code = #{shopCode},
max_num = #{maxNum},
min_num = #{minNum},
account_num = #{accountNum},
occupy_num = #{occupyNum},
available_num = #{availableNum},
description = #{description},
where shopkeeper_warehouse_key = #{shopkeeperWarehouseKey}
